result.reason: The RDP ActiveX control strictly limits 'MaxReconnectAttempts' to 20, causing the application to revert to 20 even when the UI allows setting up to 200. A manual reconnection loop must be implemented to support higher values.
result.approach: Modify `RdpProtocol.cs` to handle reconnection counts > 20 by implementing a custom reconnection timer/loop in the `OnDisconnected` event, bypassing the ActiveX control's `MaxReconnectAttempts` limit.
